name: default_canary_slo
description: Default SLO strategy for canary deployments with p95 latency and recall@10 monitoring

rules.name: p95_latency
rules.description: P95 latency must be <= 1200ms for 2 consecutive buckets

rules.name: recall_at_10
rules.description: Recall@10 must be >= 0.30 for 2 consecutive buckets

alert_config.description: Send alerts to console and file for SLO violations

rollback_config.description: Automatically rollback after 2 consecutive SLO violations, max 5 rollbacks per hour
